name: Gobleratu
description:
Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam in 48 hours.

You are being  mind controlled by an evil force. Your actions are out of your control. Try to escape the grasp of the evil force  and regain control.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys / Left stick - Movement
R / Select button - Restart

Credits:

Alex  Kaminaris - Art

Alex Podaras - Programming

Thodoris Moustakas - Sound design / Music
